eventName: Where Vernal Winds Will Never Blow
storyInfo: Jieyun wanders around the city, looking for a chance to escape, while taking in the unfamiliar nomadic city. Meanwhile, the mastermind appears before Lin YÃ¼hsia.

attributes.content: The sun sets in the west.
Both the people and the city walls cast long shadows, covering the stalls by the road. A vendor closes his umbrella and yawns.
Closing up! 30% off on what's left so I can go home for dinner!
attributes.name: Yawning Vendor

attributes.content: Just go. Tourists these days don't care about your toy weapons anymore.
attributes.name: Bored Vendor

attributes.content: I would have joined the army if I had the skills to forge real swords.
attributes.name: Yawning Vendor

attributes.content: Say, I saw a tourist carrying a blood-red sword yesterday. Now that was something unusual. I wonder where it came from...
attributes.name: Bored Vendor

attributes.content: The girl looks around, perplexed. She has never seen a scene like this before.
The ground rumbles slightly underneath her feet, likely a sign that the nomadic city is decelerating. The people on the streets seem completely unperturbed by it, going about their business as usual.
She smells the aroma of food, and remembers that she has not eaten for two days.
The soreness all over her body hits at the same time as the hunger.
Her legs take on a mind of their own, following the scent to a restaurant.
What would you like?
attributes.name: Waiter

attributes.content: Er... whatever that person is having.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Cold noodles with roasted meat for table three!
attributes.name: Waiter

attributes.content: It is near dinner time, and the place is almost full. A good, hearty dinner is the most comforting thing for honest, working people who have been busy all day.
The TV on the wall plays a martial arts drama on repeat, the familiar story occasionally catching the attention of the customers.
(Why does the man in the box look like him?)
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: (The swordswoman next to him looks a little like Shifu, but not quite the same...)
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: (What does 'adapted from true events' mean?)
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Your noodles, miss.
attributes.name: Waiter

attributes.content: T-Thank you.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: I say a hundred-meter scroll signed by every single person in town. Now that's a meaningful gift!
attributes.name: Townsfolk A

attributes.content: Ni sha le ma? The Grandmaster is going on a journey. How is he gonna carry that?
attributes.name: Townsfolk B

attributes.content: Better to have something practical, like some local food for him to eat on the way.
attributes.name: Townsfolk B

attributes.content: How many years has the Grandmaster protected Yumen?
attributes.name: Townsfolk A

attributes.content: All I know that he's been around since before my dad was born.
attributes.name: Townsfolk B

attributes.content: He must be more than a hundred! No wonder he's leaving his post. It must take a toll on him.
attributes.name: Townsfolk A

attributes.content: But I've heard some jianghu wanderers say that they've seen him lately, and he still looks like he's middle-aged.
attributes.name: Townsfolk B

attributes.content: Wait... is he immortal or something?
attributes.name: Townsfolk A

attributes.content: I heard there are those who live much longer than normal, thanks to Arts. The Grandmaster must be one of those.
attributes.name: Townsfolk B

attributes.content: Anyway, the one thing everyone should remember is that he's the hero and protector of Yumen.
attributes.name: Townsfolk B

attributes.content: Never heard about a spouse or kids, though. What a shame, when you consider that General Zuo's son has already reached adulthood...
attributes.name: Townsfolk B

attributes.content: (They called him a hero?)
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: How did you like your meal, miss?
attributes.name: Waiter

attributes.content: It was very good.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Now, the bill...
attributes.name: Waiter

attributes.content: I'll take care of it.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Th-Thank you...
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Sure... Now how about that, we meet again.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Did you lose your wallet, or just forgot?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: I... lost it...
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Ouch, that's unlucky.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Looks like you're new around here. I'm guessing you don't really know the place? I'll go with you to report the loss.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Th-Thank you, but I'm fine...
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: I-I'll pay you back next time!
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Hold on.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Is this the sword you said you were looking for?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Are you trying to take it too?!
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: What do you think I am, a thief?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: But I've heard rumors that a special sword went missing. Could it be...?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: ...I have to go.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Who's there?
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Show yourself!
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: They say you don't try this with martial artists.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Especially not with the martial artist.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Am I a goner if he just takes a swing by instinct without looking?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Then I would have to arrest him for manslaughter.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: So, did I win the bet?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You did.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I had a bet with Liang Xun over how you'd react when you saw us.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: He said you would turn around and leave, but I said you would freeze on the spot.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Never seen one who could read others better than you.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Well, he is my oath-brother. Not exactly a stranger.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Don't worry, Waai Fu doesn't know you're here.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: A reunion of father and daughter calls for a grander occasion, after all.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I'm not like our lord magistrate over here, who drags me into trouble the first time we see each other in a dozen years.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Yes, I know I owe you one...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Is it too much sarcasm if I keep harping on this?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Well, there's no one else here, just the three of us.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: We have wine and food. Shall we sit down and chat?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: The locations of all the suspicious warehouses have been sent to your terminals.
attributes.name: Lungmen Tourist?

attributes.content: Check them one by one, going from east to west. Move quickly; time is short.
attributes.name: Lungmen Tourist?

attributes.content: Don't do anything rash, if you find something. Contact the others, and we'll move in togethâ
attributes.name: Lungmen Tourist?

attributes.content: Were you looking for me?
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: He reacts quickly. Years of experience have taught him when it is time to fight, and when it is time for flight.
As soon as he turns around, however, he feels a hand on his shoulder, immobilizing him.
Why are you trying to run, if you're looking for me?
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Lungmen Tourist?

attributes.content: Sharp, but not enough guts. Fix that, and there's potential for bigger things for you.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: The old man withdraws his hand.
Tell Miss Lin that I will be waiting for her at the warehouse in the southern city, on fifth street, block seven, at the Hour of Shen.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Not drinking?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I'm still on duty.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: What about you?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Alcohol isn't good for you.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Well, what are we gonna do if we're not drinking or talking? Just stare at each other?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Didn't you have something to ask him, Mr. Liang?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I could ask you the same.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Have we gotten to the point that we can't talk while sober?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: If you have something to say, say it.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: What have you been doing...?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Wandering.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Looking for strong opponents in each new place, until there's no one left. Then I move on.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: I had to study Mr. Liang to see what the changes were over the years. You, Waai, or I guess Huai, you wear them on your face.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: What changed?
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: You got old.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: That's obvious.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: I was actually worried I was going to hear someday that you died in a duel.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Would I?
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: There's always someone better, as they say...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: So... how long have you been in Yumen?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Three years.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: There's someone here who promised to fight me.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: He said it could take three years, five years, ten years, maybe more.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Huai Tianpei, so obsessed with earning fame, learning patience...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: What's a few years here? There's no one else to fight anyway.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: So you've been working at the clinic for three years.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: The scent of herbal medicine covers up the aroma of the wine. There is nothing left but a bitter taste.
'Pulsatilla yanensis', 'psychotria rubra', 'zanthoxylum avicennae', 'senecio scandens'...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I spent almost a month asking the various schools, never imagining that you were right here in this clinic opposite the inn.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Debts have to be paid.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Then you know who it is you owe the biggest debt.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: That's all I have to say. What about you, Mr. Liang?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Just here to see how an old friend is doing. It's not an interrogation.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Huai Tianpei has been in Yumen for three years. You've been here a while yourself. But you picked this time to visit.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: It's no time to consider private sentiment, when there is unrest in the city.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: In your patriotism, you won't even permit commoners like us to think of private sentiment?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: What do...?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I'll sit for a while longer if you're really here to reminisce about old times.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: But look at us, we've gotten to the point where we can't even talk freely?
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Huai Tianpei picks up his cup, drinks it dry, and leaves the room.
Did you get the answer you were looking for, Mr. Liang?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I guess so.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: As Huai Tianpei's oath-brother, or as the advisor of Yumen?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I should be used to you seeing through things by now.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Maybe you should change your habit of bringing trouble on yourself. At least don't get to the point where you don't even have someone to talk to.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: There's a job he just might be the right man for...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Like how you had me handle that goblet?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Nothing that complicated.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Even when he's Huai Tianpei, he's still Waai Tinpui.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: He's the hardest to change.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: What about you and I?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: The same flowers, the same wine, but the spirit of youth is no more.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: It's precious enough that we can still sit around the same table and chat a little over a drink. It's a fool's errand to try to go back to the past.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You're trying to stop me too?
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: A lot has happened over the past couple of days. There's a lot happening that I'm not sure about.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: If you mean no harm, I suggest you stay and help explain what's happening.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: I don't have time.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Hand it over.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: No!
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Did they follow you?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: I don't know them.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Are you the ones who been causing trouble around town?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Stupid girlâ
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: (Was she holding back when she fought me in the ring?)
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: These crooks sure can bark, even if they can't bite.
attributes.name: Waai Fu
